rows.label: bf06210100_0010
rows.name: My Lord. Genbu has begun surfacing.

rows.label: bf06210100_0050
rows.name:
We have received reports that he made contact
with the Holy Grail in Acedia.

rows.label: bf06210100_0060
rows.name:
So after 500 years, he makes his move...
The Pope Marveni,

rows.label: bf06210100_0080
rows.name:
We must act. To protect our days of peace.
Even if they are fleeting dream...
